rows.label: qst700101_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah! I'm sorry, in front of
a customer, too! I was
completely lost in thought.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0003
rows.name:
It's my friend. Lately, he's
just been staring into space...
I'm worried something's wrong.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0004
rows.name:
He won't even eat his favorite fish...
I know something must have happened,
but he won't talk to me...

rows.label: qst700101_msg0005
rows.name:
Um, if you don't mind,
could you maybe try talking
to my friend for me?

rows.label: qst700101_msg0006
rows.name:
His name is Joey. He
takes care of the Armu.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm sorry to ask such a strange
favor. If it's nothing, then
that's for the best.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0101
rows.name:
Could you talk to Joey
for me? He's the one who
takes care of the Armu.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0102
rows.name:
And if something's wrong, I'd be so
grateful if you could help him. He
just won't tell me anything...
